title: Add console log every 60 frames
message_prompt: Now, in my camera, I want to log my position (x, y, z) to the console once per second using useFrame. If we know approximately the fps, just console it every N frames.
message_edit:
I will update the Camera.js file to include the useFrame hook from @react-three/fiber, which will allow us to log the camera's position to the console every N frames. Assuming an approximate frame rate of 60 fps, we can log the position once per second by logging every 60 frames.

Steps:
1. Import the useFrame hook in Camera.js.
2. Update the Camera component to use the useFrame hook and log the camera's position every 60 frames.
